snippet: American Atheists, an advocacy group for atheists, has posted two billboards targeting disbelieving members of the Muslim community in Paterson, N.J., and the Orthodox Jewish community of Williamsburg.
abstract: American Atheists, an advocacy group for atheists, has posted two billboards targeting disbelieving members of the Muslim community in Paterson, N.J., and the Orthodox Jewish community of Williamsburg.

headline.main: On Billboards, a Bilingual Call to Nonbelievers
